DIALOGUE_Hallways:
Alien: The hallways don't really have
 a lot of students, but they take
 a long time to get through.
DIALOGUE_Classrooms:
Alien: Classrooms are really crowded,
 but they are a lot quicker than
 hallways.
DIALOGUE_Distortion:
Alien: Don't come in here. My project
 has messed up this room. Stupid
 Saturn teleporters!! I know the correct
 teleporter is in here
DIALOGUE_NotAttacking:
Alien: Woah, I'm not going to attack 
 you. Earth club wants you, but I hate them. 
 I don't want th help them.
DIALOGUE_Helping:
Alien: Earth Club is not popular. 
 Don't be surprised if people offer
 you advice. We all want them to fail.
DIALOGUE_DontTouch:
Alien: If you see a project, don't 
 touch it! It is not yours, even if
 it is a laser!
DIALOGUE_NextLevel:
Alien: Earth club has the door
 controls since  it is Earth day.
 Jerks locked the doors. Might have
 to beat them up for them to
 unlock them.
DIALOGUE_Blob:
Alien: The Earth Club keeps a nasty 
 blob as a pet. These are parts of it.
